segments.text: I see a woman methodically drying a plate, completely oblivious to the water cascading over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is steadily expanding, a small river forming beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how she doesn’t even glance at the chaos unfolding around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s lost in her thoughts or simply too focused on her task at hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children seem to be plotting something mischievous, their eyes shining with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a twinge of worry as I watch the boy teeter precariously on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl staring up at him, arm outstretched, reminds me of how easily accidents can happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a strange juxtaposition: here’s this calm kitchen, yet everything feels on the verge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies in that jar must be too enticing for any child to resist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but think that something is bound to go wrong if no one notices soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
